text:
Esbon is a city in Jewell County, Kansas, United States. As of the 2010 census, 99 people lived there.
History.
Esbon was planned out in 1873. It was incorporated as a city in 1904.
The first post office in Esbon was created in January 1874.
Esbon was a shipping point on the Chicago, Rock Island and Pacific Railroad.
Geography.
According to the United States Census Bureau says that the city has a total area of. All of it is land.
2010 census.
As of the 2010 census says that there were 99 people, 52 households, and 24 families living in the city.
